Method Detail

getCommands

execute

public java.lang.String execute(java.lang.String... args)
                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
Executes a script line by line in the Android Shell. If the first line begins with #!, the following text will be executed to open the appropriate shell. Note the Android Shell Path: /sbin:/vendor/bin:/system/sbin:/system/bin:/system/xbin

Parameters:
commands - the list of commands to execute
args - arguments to pass to the shell script
Returns:
output string, or null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if the requested program can not be executed.
java.lang.InterruptedException - if the native thread is interrupted.
